medical_history.chief_complaint: Atrial fibrillation with episodes of palpitations and throat tightness.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: In December 2000, Mrs B experienced several self-limited episodes of palpitations and throat tightness. By May 2001, she had a severe episode requiring emergency treatment and was found to be in atrial fibrillation (AF). The frequency of her episodes increased, occurring once or twice weekly and lasting 8 to 10 hours. Despite treatment with a beta-blocker, she later became persistent in AF.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had coronary heart disease, AF, hypothyroidism, and died from an AF-related stroke. Father died of a brain tumor.
medical_history.social_history: Retired teacher, drinks up to 2 glasses of wine daily, does not smoke, exercises regularly.
